means: 富拉人(西非黑人和含米特人混血血统的穆斯林牧民)
富拉语(西非、属尼日尔—刚果语)[亦作 Fulah， Ful ／fu:l／]

PerfectNetExp.abs: The Application of Modbus Protocol Network in the Sudan Fula Oilfield Production & Development ProjectModbus协议网络在苏丹富拉油田生产开发项目中的应用

means.word_mean: 1. a member of a pastoral and nomadic people of western Africa; they are traditionally cattle herders of Muslim faith
2. a family of languages of the Fulani people of West Africa and used as a lingua franca in the sub-Saharan regions from Senegal to Chad; the best known of the West African languages

auth_sentence.content: But the CD I Speak Fula wisely avoids crossovers with Western music and cameos by foreign celebrities.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the CD I Speak Fula wisely avoids crossovers with Western music and cameos by foreign celebrities.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the CD I Speak Fula wisely avoids crossovers with Western music and cameos by foreign celebrities.
